headline: Is STERIS Set for More Growth After Recent 10% Rally in 2025?
summary: Thinking about what to do with STERIS stock right now? You are definitely not alone. Maybe you have noticed the share price creeping up recently or you are wondering if things could get even better from here. Over just the last month, STERIS has climbed more than 10% and is up 22% year-to-date. Even over the past five years, the company has delivered an impressive 64% total return. That kind of consistency catches attention, whether you are a long-term holder or just scanning for your next...
